comment.author: 26595758@N02
comment._content: I'm curious.  Why is the man standing in front of the Library wearing a top hat, tails & Fancy dress trousers? That would be formal evening wear.  Who is he & what party was interrupted.  My guess is that he was a follower of neither Emilio Zapata nor Pancho Villa.

comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content:
Today is Azucenas Street almost on the corner of Juárez.  The facade is facing South. Behind the library is Puente Internacional Paso del Norte, going North by Juárez Street.
Roberto Duarte M D
